verses.verse: For the law <S%G3551><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> a shadow <S%G4639><s%> of good <S%G18><s%> things to come, <S%G3195><s%> and not the very <S%G846><s%> image <S%G1504><s%> of the things, <S%G4229><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> never <S%G3763><s%> with those <S%G3588><s%> <S%G846><s%> sacrifices <S%G2378><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> they offered <S%G4374><s%> year <S%G1763><s%> by year <S%G1763><s%> continually <S%G1519><s%> <S%G1336><s%> make <S%G5055><s%> the comers <S%G4334><s%> thereunto <S%G4334><s%> perfect. <S%G5048><s%>

For then would they not have ceased <S%G3973><s%> to be offered? <S%G4374><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> that the worshippers <S%G3000><s%> once <S%G530><s%> purged <S%G2508><s%> should have <S%G2192><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3367><s%> more <S%G2089><s%> conscience <S%G4893><s%> of sins. <S%G266><s%>
But in those <S%G3588><s%> <S%G846><s%> sacrifices there is a remembrance <S%G364><s%> again <S%G364><s%> made of sins <S%G266><s%> every <S%G2596><s%> year. <S%G1763><s%>
For it is not possible <S%G102><s%> that the blood <S%G129><s%> of bulls <S%G5022><s%> and of goats <S%G5131><s%> should take <S%G851><s%> away <S%G851><s%> sins. <S%G266><s%>

By the which <S%G3739><s%> will <S%G2307><s%> we are sanctified <S%G37><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the offering <S%G4376><s%> of the body <S%G4983><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> once <S%G2178><s%> for all. <S%G2178><s%>

And every <S%G3956><s%> priest <S%G2409><s%> stands <S%G2476><s%> daily <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2250><s%> ministering <S%G3008><s%> and offering <S%G4374><s%> oftentimes <S%G4178><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> sacrifices, <S%G2378><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> never <S%G3763><s%> take <S%G4014><s%> away <S%G4014><s%> sins: <S%G266><s%>

But this <S%G3778><s%> man, after he had offered <S%G4374><s%> one <S%G3391><s%> sacrifice <S%G2378><s%> for sins <S%G266><s%> for ever, <S%G1336><s%> sat <S%G2523><s%> down <S%G2523><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the right <S%G1188><s%> hand of God; <S%G2316><s%>
From now on <S%G3063><s%> expecting <S%G1551><s%> till <S%G2193><s%> his enemies <S%G2190><s%> be made <S%G5087><s%> his footstool. <S%G5286><s%>
For by one <S%G3391><s%> offering <S%G4376><s%> he has perfected <S%G5048><s%> for ever <S%G1336><s%> them that are sanctified. <S%G37><s%>
Whereof the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> is a witness <S%G3140><s%> to us: for after <S%G3326><s%> that he had said <S%G4280><s%> before, <S%G4280><s%>

This <S%G3778><s%> is the covenant <S%G1242><s%> that I will make <S%G1303><s%> with them after <S%G3326><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> I will put <S%G1325><s%> my laws <S%G3551><s%> into <S%G1909><s%> their hearts, <S%G2588><s%> and in their minds <S%G1271><s%> will I write <S%G1924><s%> them;
And their sins <S%G266><s%> and iniquities <S%G458><s%> will I remember <S%G3415><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> more. <S%G2089><s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> remission <S%G859><s%> of these <S%G5130><s%> is, there is no <S%G3765><s%> more <S%G2089><s%> offering <S%G4376><s%> for sin. <S%G266><s%>
Having <S%G2192><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> boldness <S%G3954><s%> to enter <S%G1529><s%> into the holiest <S%G39><s%> by the blood <S%G129><s%> of Jesus, <S%G2424><s%>

By a new <S%G4372><s%> and living <S%G2198><s%> way, <S%G3598><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he has consecrated <S%G1457><s%> for us, through <S%G1223><s%> the veil, <S%G2665><s%> that is to say, his flesh; <S%G4561><s%>
And having an high <S%G3173><s%> priest <S%G2409><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> the house <S%G3624><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%>

Let us draw <S%G4334><s%> near <S%G4334><s%> with a true <S%G228><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> in full <S%G4136><s%> assurance <S%G4136><s%> of faith, <S%G4102><s%> having our hearts <S%G2588><s%> sprinkled <S%G4473><s%> from an evil <S%G4190><s%> conscience, <S%G4893><s%> and our bodies <S%G4983><s%> washed <S%G3068><s%> with pure <S%G2513><s%> water. <S%G5204><s%>

Let us hold <S%G2722><s%> fast <S%G2722><s%> the profession <S%G3671><s%> of our faith <S%G1680><s%> without <S%G186><s%> wavering; <S%G186><s%> (for he is faithful <S%G4103><s%> that promised; <S%G1861><s%>)
And let us consider <S%G2657><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another <S%G240><s%> to provoke <S%G3948><s%> to love <S%G26><s%> and to good <S%G2570><s%> works: <S%G2041><s%>

Not forsaking <S%G1459><s%> the assembling <S%G1997><s%> of ourselves <S%G1438><s%> together, <S%G1997><s%> as the manner <S%G1485><s%> of some <S%G5100><s%> is; but exhorting <S%G3870><s%> one another: and so <S%G5118><s%> much <S%G5118><s%> the more, <S%G3123><s%> as you see <S%G991><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> approaching. <S%G1448><s%>

For if we sin <S%G264><s%> willfully <S%G1596><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> that we have received <S%G2983><s%> the knowledge <S%G1922><s%> of the truth, <S%G225><s%> there remains <S%G620><s%> no <S%G3765><s%> more <S%G2089><s%> sacrifice <S%G2378><s%> for sins, <S%G266><s%>

But a certain <S%G5100><s%> fearful <S%G5398><s%> looking <S%G1561><s%> for of judgment <S%G2920><s%> and fiery <S%G4442><s%> indignation, <S%G2205><s%> which shall devour <S%G2068><s%> the adversaries. <S%G5227><s%>

He that despised <S%G114><s%> Moses' <S%G3475><s%> law <S%G3551><s%> died <S%G599><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> mercy <S%G3628><s%> under <S%G1909><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> witnesses: <S%G3144><s%>

Of how <S%G4214><s%> much <S%G4214><s%> sorer <S%G5501><s%> punishment, <S%G5098><s%> suppose <S%G1380><s%> you, shall he be thought worthy, <S%G515><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> has trodden <S%G2662><s%> under <S%G2662><s%> foot <S%G2662><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and has counted <S%G2233><s%> the blood <S%G129><s%> of the covenant, <S%G1242><s%> with which <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> he was sanctified, <S%G37><s%> an unholy <S%G2839><s%> thing, and has done <S%G1796><s%> despite <S%G1796><s%> to the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of grace? <S%G5485><s%>

For we know <S%G1492><s%> him that has said, <S%G2036><s%> Vengeance <S%G1557><s%> belongs to me, I will recompense, <S%G467><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> the Lord. <S%G2962><s%> And again, <S%G3825><s%> The Lord <S%G2962><s%> shall judge <S%G2919><s%> his people. <S%G2992><s%>
It is a fearful <S%G5398><s%> thing to fall <S%G1706><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the hands <S%G5495><s%> of the living <S%G2198><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

But call <S%G363><s%> to remembrance <S%G363><s%> the former <S%G4386><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> in which, <S%G3739><s%> after you were illuminated, <S%G5461><s%> you endured <S%G5278><s%> a great <S%G4183><s%> fight <S%G119><s%> of afflictions; <S%G3804><s%>

Partly, <S%G5124><s%> <S%G3303><s%> whilst you were made <S%G2301><s%> a spectacle <S%G2301><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> by reproaches <S%G3680><s%> and afflictions; <S%G2347><s%> and partly, <S%G5124><s%> <S%G1161><s%> whilst you became <S%G1096><s%> companions <S%G2844><s%> of them that were so <S%G3779><s%> used. <S%G390><s%>

For you had compassion <S%G4834><s%> of me in my bonds, <S%G1199><s%> and took <S%G4327><s%> joyfully <S%G3326><s%> <S%G5479><s%> the spoiling <S%G724><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> goods, <S%G5224><s%> knowing <S%G1097><s%> in yourselves <S%G1438><s%> that you have <S%G2192><s%> in heaven <S%G3772><s%> a better <S%G2909><s%> and an enduring <S%G3306><s%> substance. <S%G5223><s%>

Cast <S%G577><s%> not away <S%G577><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> confidence, <S%G3954><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> recompense <S%G3405><s%> of reward. <S%G3405><s%>

For you have need <S%G5532><s%> of patience, <S%G5281><s%> that, after you have done <S%G4160><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> you might receive <S%G2865><s%> the promise. <S%G1860><s%>
For yet <S%G2089><s%> a little <S%G3397><s%> while, <S%G3397><s%> and he that shall come <S%G2064><s%> will come, <S%G2240><s%> and will not tarry. <S%G5549><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> the just <S%G1342><s%> shall live <S%G2198><s%> by faith: <S%G4102><s%> but if <S%G1437><s%> any man draw <S%G5288><s%> back, <S%G5288><s%> my soul <S%G5590><s%> shall have no <S%G3756><s%> pleasure <S%G2106><s%> in him.
But we are not of them who draw <S%G5289><s%> back <S%G5289><s%> to perdition; <S%G684><s%> but of them that believe <S%G4102><s%> to the saving <S%G4047><s%> of the soul. <S%G5590><s%>
